tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE LiteratureReviewDatabase (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title TEXT NOT NULL,
    author TEXT NOT NULL,
    publication_date DATE,
    abstract TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE literature_reviews (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  title VARCHAR(255),
  author VARCHAR(255),
  publication_date DATE,
  findings TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE publications (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  title VARCHAR(255),
  author VARCHAR(255),
  publication_date DATE,
  citation_count INT
)

CREATE TABLE LiteratureReview (
  literature_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  title VARCHAR(255),
  author VARCHAR(255),
  publication_date DATE,
  abstract TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE ResearchFindings (
  findings_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  literature_id INT REFERENCES LiteratureReview(literature_id),
  research_summary TEXT,
  category VARCHAR(50),
  status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Publications (
  publication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  publication_title VARCHAR(255),
  publication_date DATE,
  authors TEXT,
  keywords TEXT
);
